snippet: In Catherine Galasso’s “Bring on the Lumière!,” pioneering French filmmakers from the 1890s meet contemporary dance, at the Joyce SoHo.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews New York premiere of Catherine Galasso dance Bring on the Lumiere at the Joyce SoHo theater.
lead_paragraph: In Catherine Galasso’s “Bring on the Lumière!,” pioneering French filmmakers from the 1890s meet contemporary dance, at the Joyce SoHo.

headline.seo: Catherine Galasso’s ‘Bring on the Lumière!,’ at Joyce SoHo
headline.main: Physical Flickers of Light and Motion Animate Film Pioneers
headline.print_headline: Physical Flickers of Light and Motion Animate Film Pioneers
